libqif.util¶

Util methods.

libqif.util.check_prob_distribution(prob)[source]¶

Chech wheter an array is a probability distribution or not. All the values must be in the interval [0,1] and they must sum up to 1. It raises an exception if the array is not a probability distribution or does nothing if it is a valid probability distribution.

Parameters:

prob (list, numpy.ndarray) – Array containing a probability distribution.
